price: ហើយនៅថ្ងៃដែលអល់ឡោះហៅពួកគេ រួចទ្រង់មានបន្ទូល ថាៈ តើពួកអ្នកបានឆ្លើយតបអ្វីខ្លះចំពោះបណ្ដាអ្នកនាំសារ?
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ يُنَادِيهِمۡ فَيَقُولُ مَاذَآ أَجَبۡتُمُ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wayawma yunādīhim fayaqūlu mādhā ajabtumu al-mur'salīna
